item.title: Uploading Files
item.description: To cut a file on the laser cutter, first open up link (wam.wazer.com) image There you will need to sign in, get an adult to sign into the website for you. Once you sign in, the worksace will open up automatically Image Uploading To upload your file click Import File and select your SVG or DXF file Image Once you have done that, you will see the name of your part, as well as some options

item.title: Cut Settings
item.description: Once your file is set up properly, we will now set up the machine to cut it. Material settings First click the tab labeled Material Image Then select the material currently loaded in the Water Cutter Cutting Path Next select Cutting Path Image This will show the exact way that the cutter will cut your file. if you want to keep the piece outside of your file select inside, and if you want to keep the piece inside of your file select outside.

item.title: Cutting
item.description: Once you have your file created, remove the SD card from the Wazer and plug it into your computer. Drag your file onto the SD card, eject it, and
